pullRequest.title: Replace java.util.Logger with logging facade
pullRequest.bodyText: Adding copy of facade from main code line.  Logging should be the same(similar) in both integration tests as main line.

commit.message: brought LoggingFacade over from main code to replace java.util.Logger
